commandInfo.name: submit [IGN] [Game-mode] [forum profile link] [Your message] <evidence>
commandInfo.description:
Submit your record!
Evidence may be sent after your submission.

Connected accounts may submit by
`submit [Game-mode] [Your message] <evidence>`
See also `connect`
commandInfo.example: submit rubik_cube_man Parkour https://www.cubecraft.net/members/rubik_cube_man.5/ Fastest time Barn 1 5:232s

commandInfo.name: form
commandInfo.description: Sends a link to a google form through which you can submit your record too!

commandInfo.name: link
commandInfo.description: Sends a link to the CCG Records Thread.

commandInfo.name: connect [In-Game Name] [Forums link]
commandInfo.description: Allows you to link your account for easier submissions.

commandInfo.name: accept [Submission code]
commandInfo.description:
Used to accept a submission.
When this command is executed the submission owner gets pinged about their submission status and the submission is automatically removed from the queue.

commandInfo.name: deny [Submission code] [feedback]
commandInfo.description:
Used to deny a submission.
When this command is executed the submission owner gets pinged about their submission status and the submission is automatically removed from the queue.
commandInfo.example: deny 1234 We require video evidence for Parkour records :^)

commandInfo.name: bind
commandInfo.description:
bind queue - to define #queue channel
bind feedback - to define feedback channel
bind @role - set perms for who can use the bind command

commandInfo.name: setMember [@role]
commandInfo.description: Sets the member role for verification.

commandInfo.name: say [#channel] <Your message>
commandInfo.description: Allows you to let the bot send a message with custom text.
commandInfo.example: say #general This bot is very cool üòè

commandInfo.name: delete [Submission code]
commandInfo.description: Deletes a submission without pinging the user.

commandInfo.name: verify [forums account link]/[code]
commandInfo.description:
Use `verify [forums account link]` to request a verification code.
After you received the code use `verify [code]` to gain access to the server.

commandInfo.name: setVerify [#channel]
commandInfo.description: set a channel in which we receive verification codes, this might be temporarily until we can send codes on the forums automatically.

commandInfo.name: tag on / off
commandInfo.description: Choose whether you want to be verified about your submission being reviewed or not.
